=== Second Draft - take two ===
<nowiki>[[File:newyorkregion3.png]]</nowiki>
This region idea would be starting point and eventually would need to be subdivided. Taking the regions as laid out in Draft Two, we would combine the regions as such to form 4 large regions...

===== WEST =====
 Niagra and West Finger Lakes.
===== CENTRAL =====
 East Finger Lakes and West Adirondacks.
===== EAST =====
 East Adirondacks and Capital.
===== South =====
 Hudson Valley and Long Island.
